properties.headline: T3CON11 - Frankfurt
properties.text:
This year's biggest TYPO3 conference will again take place close to Frankfurt, Germany:

Tutorial Day: Thursday, October 6 2011 (separate ticket required)
Main Conference: Friday, October 7 - Saturday, October 8 2011

We invite you to a stunning event with a broad range of topics and professional speakers. This will be a great opportunity to learn more about the powerful TYPO3 CMS, the FLOW3 framework and to connect with other managers, developers and designers from all over the world. Many internationally known leaders of the TYPO3 community will attend and present.

Photostream T3CON10

More

properties.headline: Location
properties.text:
The T3CON11 Frankfurt will take place in the Congress Park Hanau (CPH), just a 30-minute ride from Frankfurt International Airport. CPH is central in every regard: At the center of Germany, in the heart of Hessen, CPH can be easily accessed by train, car, or public transportation.

Hanau is situated just 34 kilometers from the Frankfurt Airport and 20 kilometers from Messe Frankfurt, with an ICE high-speed train link and direct connections to the A3, A45 and A66 highways.

Birthplace of the Brothers Grimm, the town's location on the rivers Main and Kinzig makes it the economic and cultural center of the eastern Rhine-Main region. Along with its leading material technology companies, Hanau also has much to offer by way of culture and scenery, giving the CPH unique appeal throughout Germany.

properties.headline: Getting there by train
properties.text:
The Congress Park Hanau and Deutsche Bahn offer a specially priced package for getting to Hanau and back home. Detailed information on the special train ticket package is available in PDF form.

To get to the conference location from the train station you can take a cab or use public transport.

properties.headline: Getting there by plane
properties.text:
The Congress Park Hanau is located just 30 minutes from the airport in Frankfurt (FRA).

To get to the conference location from the airport you can take a cab or use public transport.

properties.headline: Getting there by public transport
properties.text:
The Congress Park Hanau can be reached by public transport easily.

Take buses number 2 or 10 to stop "Nordstraße," close to "Schlosspark." When taking bus number 3 leave at stop "Schlossplatz."

From the "Freiheitsplatz" ("Freedom Square," about 600 meters walking distance) connections into all of Hanau and to the central train station (lines number 2 and 7) are available until late in the night.

properties.headline: Getting there by car
properties.text: General: Follow the signs for "Congress Park Hanau" or "CPH". Detailed information on how to get there by car is available in PDF form.

properties.headline: Hotels
properties.text:
The following hotels have special prices available for attendes of the T3CON11.

Unless otherwise noted, mention the keywords "TYPO3", "T3CON" or " Conference CPH" when booking to get the discounted rate.

Arcadia Hotel Hanau

Kurt-Blaum-Platz 6
63450 Hanau
Phone: (+49) 6181 3055 0
Facsimile: (+49) 6181 3055 444
http://www.arcadia-hotel.de/hanau/das-hotel.html

From October 4th to 9th special rate of 89,- € in single and 104,- € in double rooms, breakfast included. Cancellation up to 4 weeks before the stay is free. Free Parking. Use this form for booking!

Best Western Premier Hotel Villa Stokkum ****

Steinheimer Vorstadt 70
63456 Hanau
Phone: +49 (0) 6181-6640
Facsimile: +49 (0) 6181-661580
http://villastokkum.bestwestern.de/

From October 4th to 9th special rate of 118,- € in single and 144,- € in double rooms, breakfast included. Free Parking. Free WLAN with 3MBit downstream and 512 kBit upstream. Use this form for booking! Cancellation only possible upon request and after the hotel confirmed.

Hotel Residence Ltd.

63450 Hanau

Hotel Zum Riesen

Facsimile: +49 (0) 6181 250 259
http://www.hanauhotel.de
info@hanauhotel.de

From October 4th to 9th special rate of 99,- € in single rooms in the main house, single rooms in " Riesen Junior" or " Römerhof" 61,- €. Breakfast included. Parking 5,- € per day.

Hotel Royal Hanau

Inh. Yasser Hosseinzada
Salzstr. 14
63450 Hanau
Tel.: +049 6181/ 92 82 0
Fax: +049 6181/ 92 82 72
www.hotel-royal-hu.de
info@hotel-royal-hu.de

From October 4th to 9th special rate 55,50 € (incl. VAT) in single rooms incl. breakfast. Parking 3,- € per day.

properties.headline: Conference program
properties.text:
Also this year the TYPO3 community invites users, developers and others interested in the world's leading content management system TYPO3 to the International TYPO3 conference, T3CON11. The T3CON11 takes place from October 6th to 8th at the Congress Park Hanau (CPH) to Frankfurt, and has the motto Flow to Five.

To T3CON11, the now seventh edition of the world's largest TYPO3 event, the TYPO3 community expects about 500 participants from more than 30 countries to discuss and learn about the current state of TYPO3.

properties.headline: Become a T3CON11 speaker!
properties.text:
Also this year the TYPO3 community invites users, developers and others interested in the world's leading content management system TYPO3 to the International TYPO3 conference, T3CON11. The T3CON11 takes place from October 6th to 8th at the Congress Park Hanau (CPH) to Frankfurt, and has the motto Flow to Five.

The call for papers ended on August 7th.

properties.headline: Become a T3CON11 speaker!
properties.text:
Also this year the TYPO3 community invites users, developers and others interested in the world's leading content management system TYPO3 to the International TYPO3 conference, T3CON11. The T3CON11 takes place from October 6th to 8th at the Congress Park Hanau (CPH) to Frankfurt, and has the motto Flow to Five.

The call for papers ended on August 7th.

properties.headline: Videos of past TYPO3 conferences
properties.text:
As every year also last year our video team was hard at work and captured (most of) the sessions for your viewing pleasure. Below is a glimpse of what the T3CON channel over at vimeo has to offer.

Sessions which have been recorded between 2006 and 2010 are available for download on this site.

properties.headline: Contribute to make TYPO3 even better!
properties.text:
TYPO3 is open source software and therefore free to use and download. However, having some money available for development, travel expenses, motivation and other needs helps TYPO3 a lot.

Company support

The TYPO3 Conference T3CON11 offers companies the opportunity to contribute to the TYPO3 project in many different ways. Sponsoring the event with a monetary donation allows companies to place their company logo in prominent positions on event publications. Sponsoring companies can also donate their own product or services to the event, which will give companies added exposure at the event. Find out more in the "Become a sponsor" section.

Individual support

Your support as an individual is also greatly appreciated. Why not help with all the small things during the conference as a "helping hand"? Or just donate 10 Euro to do your tiny bit for TYPO3?

properties.headline: Sponsoring T3CON11
properties.text:
There are many ways you can support the TYPO3 community’s largest conference, and at the same time benefit your company.

Advantages for your company

  • You will make your company visible at a gathering of top-class decision makers and visionaries
  • Your company will be advertised in relation to the exclusive image of an innovative conference
  • You’ll have the opportunity to present your corporation’s products and services in an optimized environment
  • You can use T3CON11 as a platform for networking: Why not invite selected customers and partners?

There are various opportunities to integrate your company into the event and to get in touch with your target group. Of course we will consider your individual ideas as well.

We are looking forward to welcome you as a partner or sponsor of the conference!

The Target Group

At T3CON11, entrepreneurs, managers, marketing decision makers, consultants, and investors—the movers and shakers of the Internet—all come together to share ideas and information. As a sponsor, you will reach a unique collection of opinion leaders, early adopters, replicators, visionaries and trendsetters.

The participants of T3CON10 were

  • Predominantly male
  • 20-49 years old
  • Executive managers and decision makers

The conference’s intimate atmosphere offers enough space for information exchange, networking and the possibility to discuss topics and trends.

Become a Sponsor Now!

Options, prices and order form Contact now for sponsoring

properties.headline: Great response to T3CON10!
properties.text: T3CON10 was a real success! Have a look at the survey results from last year’s T3CON10 and expect T3CON11 to be even better!

properties.headline: Results of the T3CON10 visitor survey
properties.text:
What category do you fit in best?

It was interesting to see that a lot of developers attended the conference. Since T3CON10 was targeted at business people, we see lots of potential here and will invite more business-oriented people in 2011.

How do you rate the ticket fees for attending the conference?

We are happy to discover that most people thought the tickets were fairly priced. It is most likely that ticket prices will stay the same for T3CON11.

How do you rate the overall quality of the talks you attended?

It’s encouraging that people really liked the quality of the talks. We will, of course, try to organize even better talks and more interesting speakers from TYPO3 related areas, but results like these make us happy.

What do you think about the hotel the conference took place in?

Most people liked the hotel and only a few had complaints, which we’ve already investigated. A general remark was that having two different floors for the conference was a bit irritating. We'll look into it how we can improve that this year.

What is your opinion of the conference being in Frankfurt, Germany?

T3CON11 will again take place in Frankfurt, Germany.

How likely is it that you attend the next TYPO3 conference T3CON11?

Nearly 50% of the conference visitors will definitely be back in 2010. That's great, especially since only very few are probably not coming.

What is your overall rating for T3CON10?

This is somehow one of the most rewarding facts about T3CON10: Seeing that nearly everybody liked the conference and it was a great success. This gives us fuel for all the thousands of hours of work necessary for T3CON11!

Thank you!

properties.headline: Individual support
properties.text:
If you want to support the TYPO3 conference as an individual, just do it! Every single Euro is appreciated! Just donate any amount you see fit for your personal situation using the TYPO3 donation form.

If you have questions or concerns about donating, contact us!

properties.headline: domainFACTORY GmbH
properties.text:
In it's 10th year Munich-based domainFACTORY GmbH is one of the leading webhosting companies in Germany, serving more than 100,000 customers and managing well over 700,000 domain names. Following its claim "Premium Hosting. Premium Service." the company managed to establish itself as a high-quality provider with an excellent price-performance ratio.

Due to the combination of high-end server systems, extensive feature sets and outstanding customer service, domainFACTORY is capable of satisfying the high requirements of business customers and professionals. For agencies and resellers there is a product line available enabling companies to offer webhosting services in their own name.

With "JiffyBox," domainFACTORY recently launched an innovative cloud hosting service. The flexible on-demand virtual servers come with many interesting features and full remote control using the RESTful API. For cloud servers from JiffyBox you only pay what you use without any minimum contract commitments.

Offering a full range of webhosting services, from domain registration to dedicated and cloud servers, domainFACTORY also hosts many TYPO3-based projects for small private firms as well as big enterprise websites. The company's own website has also been running on TYPO3 for many years.

Facts

  • One of the leading webhosting companies in Germany
  • Over 100,000 customers with more than 700,000 domain names
  • High quality provider with excellent price-performance ratio
  • Webhosting services from domain registration to dedicated servers
  • Product line for agencies and resellers
  • Innovative cloud hosting service "JiffyBox"

Contact

Website: http://www.df.eu
E-mail: support@df.eu

Hotline: 0800 323 98 00 (outside Germany: +49 89 552660)

properties.headline: METEOS Deutschland
properties.text:
(english version below)

METEOS Deutschland mit Sitz in Mannheim ist eine inhabergeführte Full-Service-Internetagentur. Wir verfügen über mehr als 12 Jahre Erfahrung in der Entwicklung, Planung und Umsetzung von kundenspezifischen Internetanwendungen bestehend aus Internetpräsenz, Datenbanken und Geschäftsprozessen. Mit unseren funktionalen und sicheren Lösungen tragen wir dazu bei, die Geschäftsabläufe unserer Kunden zu vereinheitlichen und sie effizienter zu gestalten.

Gegründet im Jahr 1998, betreuen wir heute branchenübergreifend mehr als 150 Unternehmen und Organisationen bei der Realisierung ihres Internetauftritts. Seit 2005 ist METEOS auf den Einsatz von TYPO3 spezialisiert. Seitdem haben wir über 100 TYPO3-Projekte erfolgreich umgesetzt. Als Technikpartner arbeiten wir darüber hinaus mit Werbeagenturen bei der Planung und Umsetzung von komplexen Internetanwendungen, z. B. im Bereich Database Publishing, sowie wie bei Internetauftritten in TYPO3 zusammen.

METEOS im Überblick

Unternehmen

Inhaber: Dipl.-Ing. (FH)
Jörg Oswald, M.Sc.
Standort: Mannheim
Gründung: 01.01.1998
Mitarbeiter: 8
Kunden: >150
TYPO3-Projekte: >100

Kompetenzen

  • Internetpräsenzen in TYPO3
  • Individuelle Internetanwendungen
  • PHP und Zend
  • Datenbanken
  • Webdesign

Leistungen

  • Beratung
  • Bedarfsanalyse
  • Konzeption
  • Entwicklung und kundenspezifische Anpassung von Software
  • Projektmanagement
  • Technische Umsetzung
  • Schulung
  • Managed Hosting (Webspace / Server)
  • Wartung / Pflege (Updateservice)

Kontakt

METEOS Deutschland
TYPO3 Mannheim

Tel: 0621 762121-99
info(at)meteos.de
www.meteos.de

METEOS Deutschland

METEOS Deutschland based in Mannheim, Germany, is an owner-managed full service internet agency. With over 12 years professional experience in developing, planning and implementing of customer specific internet applications, we create unique web presences integrating databases and business processes. Our functional and secure solutions enable our customers to streamline their business processes and make them more efficient.

Since the foundation of METEOS in 1998 we have been servicing more than 150 companies and organizations with the implementation of their internet presence. For more than five years we have been focusing on TYPO3 software and have carried out over 100 customer projects successfully. As a technology partner we support advertising agencies in the planning and realization of complex internet applications, e. g. in the area of data base publishing, as well as in the creation of internet presences based on TYPO3.

METEOS at a glance

Company

Owner: Dipl.-Ing. (FH)
Jörg Oswald, M.Sc.
Location: Mannheim
Founded: 1998
Employees: 8
Customers: 150+ across
various industries
TYPO3 projects: 100+

Competencies

  • TYPO3 based webpages
  • Individual internet applications
  • PHP and Zend framework
  • Databases
  • Web design

Services

  • Consulting
  • Requirements analysis
  • Concepts
  • Software development and customer specific adaptation
  • Project management
  • Implementation services
  • Training
  • Managed Hosting (Webspace / Server)
  • Maintenance (Update services)

Contact

Tel: +49 621 762121-99
info(at)meteos.de
www.meteos.de

properties.headline: Drecomm Internet Intelligence
properties.text:
With a true Open Source footprint Drecomm is one of the leading TYPO3 implementers in the Netherlands. With a team of over 30 motivated developers we work on challenging projects based on TYPO3, Magento and Alfresco.

We are happy to be able to be Platinum Sponsor of the TYPO3 Conference for the 4th year now.

Who we work for?

We work for midsize and larger organizations. Among our clients are: SIDN, Nuon, Governments, PPG, Cendris, Rabobank and many other appealing clients.

Contact

Rotterdam: +31 (0)10 466 86 38 Dennis Reurings
Amersfoort: +31 (0)33 887 05 52 Greco Steenmetz
Groningen: +31 (0)50 577 58 22 Rogier Hosman
Website: http://www.drecomm.nl/
